name: get_current_time
description: Enhanced tool to get current date and time in 70+ formats and standards including ISO 8601, RFC 3339, Unix timestamps, Julian dates, military time, and more
author: DurgasAI

input_parameters.name: format_type
input_parameters.description: Type of time format to return

input_parameters.name: include_week_number
input_parameters.description: Whether to include week number and ISO week date

input_parameters.name: include_julian_date
input_parameters.description: Whether to include Julian Day Number and Modified Julian Day

input_parameters.name: include_epoch_variants
input_parameters.description: Whether to include various epoch time formats (Unix, JavaScript, Java)

input_parameters.name: include_historical_formats
input_parameters.description: Whether to include historical time formats (GMT, Railway Time, etc.)

input_parameters.name: custom_format_pattern
input_parameters.description: Custom strftime pattern for custom formatting (e.g., '%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S', '%m/%d/%Y', '%B %d, %Y')

input_parameters.name: include_common_strings
input_parameters.description: Whether to include common time string formats (mm/dd, dd/mm, etc.)

output_parameters.name: formatted_time
output_parameters.description: Primary formatted time based on format_type parameter

output_parameters.name: timestamp
output_parameters.description: Unix timestamp (precision based on precision parameter)

output_parameters.name: unix_timestamp_seconds
output_parameters.description: Unix timestamp in seconds

output_parameters.name: unix_timestamp_milliseconds
output_parameters.description: Unix timestamp in milliseconds

output_parameters.name: unix_timestamp_microseconds
output_parameters.description: Unix timestamp in microseconds

output_parameters.name: unix_timestamp_nanoseconds
output_parameters.description: Unix timestamp in nanoseconds

output_parameters.name: format_type
output_parameters.description: The format type that was used

output_parameters.name: timezone
output_parameters.description: Timezone information

output_parameters.name: all_formats
output_parameters.description: Collection of all major time formats in one object

output_parameters.name: timezone_info
output_parameters.description: Detailed timezone information (when include_timezone is true)

output_parameters.name: weekday
output_parameters.description: Full weekday name (when include_weekday is true)

output_parameters.name: weekday_short
output_parameters.description: Short weekday name (when include_weekday is true)

output_parameters.name: weekday_number
output_parameters.description: Weekday number 0-6 (when include_weekday is true)

output_parameters.name: week_number
output_parameters.description: ISO week number (when include_week_number is true)

output_parameters.name: year_week
output_parameters.description: ISO year-week format (when include_week_number is true)

output_parameters.name: julian_day_number
output_parameters.description: Julian Day Number (when include_julian_date is true)

output_parameters.name: modified_julian_day
output_parameters.description: Modified Julian Day (when include_julian_date is true)

output_parameters.name: julian_date
output_parameters.description: Julian date string (when include_julian_date is true)

output_parameters.name: epoch_variants
output_parameters.description: Various epoch time formats (when include_epoch_variants is true)

output_parameters.name: historical_formats
output_parameters.description: Historical time formats (when include_historical_formats is true)

output_parameters.name: custom_format_pattern
output_parameters.description: The custom format pattern used (when custom_format_pattern is provided)

output_parameters.name: custom_format_result
output_parameters.description: Result of custom format pattern (when custom_format_pattern is provided)

output_parameters.name: custom_format_error
output_parameters.description: Error message if custom format pattern is invalid (when custom_format_pattern is provided)

output_parameters.name: common_strings
output_parameters.description: Common time string formats like mm/dd, dd/mm, etc. (when include_common_strings is true)
